import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact', templateUrl: './contact.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact.component.css'] }) export class ContactComponent { }

Contact Us

Get in Touch

We would love to hear from you! If you have any questions, feedback, or inquiries about our Hospital Management App, please feel free to reach out to us using the contact details below.

  • Email: info@hospitalmanagementapp.com
  • Phone: +1 (123) 456-7890
  • Address: 123 Main Street, City, Country
